title.narrative: OUTPUT 14: EBOLA MBANDAKA - PREVENTION AND RESPONSE

description.narrative: EBOLA MBANDAKA - PREVENTION AND RESPONSE, which contributes to Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Immunization Services As Part Of Primary Health Care, Strengthening Primary Health Care And High-Impact Health Interventions. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The transmission of Ebola Virus Disease (EVD) in North Kivu and Ituri Provinces is interrupted and its spread to other provinces of the DRC and neighbouring countries, prevented
